Class SectionFactory

Manages the creation of FigaroSection objects from configuration files.

View Source

Create(String, String)

Creates a new FigaroSection instance from the specified configuration file.

Declaration
public static FigaroSection Create(string configurationFilePath, string sectionName = "Figaro")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String configurationFilePath

The path and file name of the configuration file.
System.String sectionName

The name of the FigaroSection instance.
Returns
Type Description
FigaroSection

A FigaroSection instance from configuration, or null if the section does not exist.
Remarks

This method will attempt to read a configuration file and extract the FigaroSection with the specified section name from within the configuration file. If the configuration section does not exist or is not specified, the method will return a null value indicating the section was not found.
